00040 MasterClient::MasterClient(ConnectionManagerPtr &conn_mgr,
00041     Hyperspace::SessionPtr &hyperspace, uint32_t timeout_ms,
00042     ApplicationQueuePtr &app_queue)
00043   : m_verbose(true), m_conn_manager_ptr(conn_mgr),
00044     m_hyperspace_ptr(hyperspace), m_app_queue_ptr(app_queue),
00045     m_timeout_ms(timeout_ms), m_initiated(false) {
00046 
00047   m_comm = m_conn_manager_ptr->get_comm();
00048   memset(&m_master_addr, 0, sizeof(m_master_addr));
00049 
00053   m_master_file_callback_ptr = new MasterFileHandler(this, m_app_queue_ptr);
00054   m_master_file_handle = 0;
00055   try {
00056     m_master_file_handle = m_hyperspace_ptr->open("/hypertable/master",
00057         OPEN_FLAG_READ, m_master_file_callback_ptr);
00058   }
00059   catch (Exception &e) {
00060     if (e.code() != Error::HYPERSPACE_FILE_NOT_FOUND && e.code()
00061         != Error::HYPERSPACE_BAD_PATHNAME)
00062       HT_THROW2(e.code(), e, e.what());
00063   }
00064 }
00065 
00066 
00067 MasterClient::~MasterClient() {
00068   m_hyperspace_ptr->close(m_master_file_handle);
00069 }
00070 
00071 
00072 int MasterClient::initiate_connection(DispatchHandlerPtr dhp) {
00073   m_dispatcher_handler_ptr = dhp;
00074   if (m_master_file_handle == 0)
00075     return Error::MASTER_NOT_RUNNING;
00076   try {
00077     reload_master();
00078   }
00079   catch (Exception &e) {
00080     return e.code();
00081   }
00082   return Error::OK;
00083 }

00086 int
00087 MasterClient::create_table(const char *tablename, const char *schemastr,
00088                            DispatchHandler *handler, Timer *timer) {
00089   CommBufPtr cbp(MasterProtocol::create_create_table_request(tablename,
00090                                                              schemastr));
00091   return send_message(cbp, handler, timer);
00092 }
00093 
00094 
00095 int
00096 MasterClient::create_table(const char *tablename, const char *schemastr,
00097                            Timer *timer) {
00098   DispatchHandlerSynchronizer sync_handler;
00099   EventPtr event_ptr;
00100   CommBufPtr cbp(MasterProtocol::create_create_table_request(tablename,
00101                                                              schemastr));
00102   int error = send_message(cbp, &sync_handler, timer);
00103   if (error == Error::OK) {
00104     if (!sync_handler.wait_for_reply(event_ptr)) {
00105       if (m_verbose)
00106         HT_ERRORF("Master 'create table' error, tablename=%s : %s", tablename,
00107                   MasterProtocol::string_format_message(event_ptr).c_str());
00108       error = (int)MasterProtocol::response_code(event_ptr);
00109     }
00110   }
00111   return error;
00112 }

00119   return send_message(cbp, handler, timer);

00122 
00123 int
00124 MasterClient::get_schema(const char *tablename, std::string &schema,
00125                          Timer *timer) {
00126   DispatchHandlerSynchronizer sync_handler;
00127   EventPtr event_ptr;
00128   CommBufPtr cbp(MasterProtocol::create_get_schema_request(tablename));
00129   int error = send_message(cbp, &sync_handler, timer);
00130   if (error == Error::OK) {
00131     if (!sync_handler.wait_for_reply(event_ptr)) {
00132       if (m_verbose)
00133         HT_ERRORF("Master 'get schema' error, tablename=%s : %s", tablename,
00134                   MasterProtocol::string_format_message(event_ptr).c_str());
00135       error = (int)MasterProtocol::response_code(event_ptr);
00136     }
00137     else {
00138       const uint8_t *decode_ptr = event_ptr->payload + 4;
00139       size_t decode_remain = event_ptr->payload_len - 4;
00140       schema = decode_vstr(&decode_ptr, &decode_remain);
00141     }
00142   }
00143   return error;
00144 }

00149   EventPtr event_ptr;

00152   if (error == Error::OK) {
00153     if (!sync_handler.wait_for_reply(event_ptr)) {
00154       if (m_verbose)
00155         HT_ERRORF("Master 'status' error : %s",
00156                   MasterProtocol::string_format_message(event_ptr).c_str());
00157       error = (int)MasterProtocol::response_code(event_ptr);
00158     }
00159   }
00160   return error;
00161 }

00199 int
00200 MasterClient::report_split(TableIdentifier *table, RangeSpec &range,
00201     const char *log_dir, uint64_t soft_limit, Timer *timer) {
00202   DispatchHandlerSynchronizer sync_handler;

00207   if (error == Error::OK) {
00208     if (!sync_handler.wait_for_reply(event_ptr)) {
00209       if (m_verbose)
00210         HT_ERRORF("Master 'report split' error : %s",
00211                   MasterProtocol::string_format_message(event_ptr).c_str());

00262 
00263 int
00264 MasterClient::send_message(CommBufPtr &cbp, DispatchHandler *handler,
00265                            Timer *timer) {
00266   boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00267   int error;
00268   uint32_t timeout_ms = timer ? timer->remaining() : m_timeout_ms;
00269 
00270   if ((error = m_comm->send_request(m_master_addr, timeout_ms, cbp, handler))
00271       != Error::OK) {
00272     std::string addr_str;
00273     if (m_verbose)
00274       HT_WARNF("Comm::send_request to %s failed - %s",
00275                m_master_addr.format().c_str(), Error::get_text(error));
00276   }
00277 
00278   return error;
00279 }
00280 
00281 
00282 void MasterClient::reload_master() {
00283   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00284   int error;
00285   DynamicBuffer value(0);
00286   String addr_str;
00287 
00288   m_hyperspace_ptr->attr_get(m_master_file_handle, "address", value);
00289 
00290   addr_str = (const char *)value.base;
00291 
00292   if (addr_str != m_master_addr_string) {
00293 
00294     if (m_master_addr.sin_port != 0) {
00295       if ((error = m_conn_manager_ptr->remove(m_master_addr)) != Error::OK) {
00296         if (m_verbose)
00297           HT_WARNF("Problem removing connection to Master - %s",
00298                    Error::get_text(error));
00299       }
00300       if (m_verbose)
00301         HT_INFOF("Connecting to new Master (old=%s, new=%s)",
00302                  m_master_addr_string.c_str(), addr_str.c_str());
00303     }
00304 
00305     m_master_addr_string = addr_str;
00306 
00307     InetAddr::initialize(&m_master_addr, m_master_addr_string.c_str());
00308 
00309     m_conn_manager_ptr->add(m_master_addr, 15000, "Master",
00310                             m_dispatcher_handler_ptr);
00311   }
00312 
00313 }

00316 bool MasterClient::wait_for_connection(uint32_t max_wait_ms) {
00317   return m_conn_manager_ptr->wait_for_connection(m_master_addr, max_wait_ms);
00318 }

00320 bool MasterClient::wait_for_connection(Timer &timer) {
